video.title: A day at IBM with designer James Rauhut
video.description:
IBM software designer James Y. Rauhut shows what a normal work-day is like.

Find James online:
Medium - https://medium.com/@seejamescode
Twitter - https://twitter.com/seejamescode

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Ram Madhavan
topLevelComment.text: Nice video presentation. I mean It's simple. Hoping to video my office location (IBM Bangalore) in India.

topLevelComment.author: 65KFoster
topLevelComment.text: Works at IBM yet uses macbook?

replies.author: Wayne Butane
replies.text: The real reason why tech companies use Macs is that their value decrease is lower than the value decrease of regular laptops, making them cheaper in the long run. No serious developer would prefer a Macbook that struggles when you run docker and Eclipse at the same time over a good PC or Laptop.

replies.author: Darell Arocho
replies.text: The great majority of people who work at Google, Facebook and even Microsoft use Macs for their work. Macs are just better to use for whatever tech job you have, but PCs are better for everything else.
